1.text: Chop 1 small head of cauliflower into pieces.

2.text: Boil the cauliflower for about 4 minutes and squeeze out the water.

3.text: Pulse the cauliflower pieces in a food processor until it’s fine.

4.text: Combine the cauliflower with 28 oz (56 g) of Asiago cheese and 1 egg.

5.text: Cover a cookie sheet with parchment paper and brush it with olive oil.

6.text: Spread the cauliflower and form a 12 in (30 cm) circle.

7.text: Bake the crust for 15 minutes at 475 °F (246 °C), then remove it.

8.text: Place 2 cups (200 g) of mozzarella and 1 oz (28 g) of cream cheese in a bowl.

9.text: Microwave the cheese for about 90 seconds or until it’s melted.

10.text: Mix in ¾ cup (72 g) of almond flour and 1 large egg.

11.text: Coat your hands with olive oil and knead the dough smooth.

12.text: Press the dough into a 10 in (25 cm) circle on parchment paper.

13.text: Bake the dough on a baking sheet for 10-12 minutes at 425 °F (218 °C).

14.text: Spread a keto-friendly pizza sauce over the crust.

15.text: Use salsa for a Mexican-style pizza sauce.

16.text: Sprinkle more cheese over the sauce.

17.text: Add whatever cooked meats you enjoy as pizza toppings.

18.text: Put on some tasty fresh herbs and veggies as toppings.

19.text: Bake the pizza at 400 °F (204 °C) until the cheese fully melts.
